lead_paragraph: The metro line extension that will connect Rio de Janeiro's Olympic Park in Barra de Tijuca with the rest of the city is at risk of not being finished before the Games start in August, if a delayed development bank loan is not disbursed, two senior government sources told Reuters on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Rio Subway Line May Not Be Finished Before Games
headline.main: Rio Subway Line May Not Be Finished Before Games
